extension_setup.title: üîß Browser Extension Setup
content: ‚Ä¢ Download the Video Downloader Pro extension from Chrome Web Store
‚Ä¢ Or install manually from the extension folder
‚Ä¢ Make sure Video Downloader Pro is running
‚Ä¢ Status icon turns green when connected
‚Ä¢ Click extension icon near any video
‚Ä¢ Popup appears in Video Downloader Pro
‚Ä¢ If extension doesn't connect, restart both app and browser
‚Ä¢ Make sure app is running before using extension

features.title: ‚ú® Premium Features
content: ‚Ä¢ MP3, M4A, WAV, AAC, Opus, FLAC formats

updates.title: üîÑ Updates & Maintenance
content: ‚Ä¢ App checks for updates on startup
‚Ä¢ Visit our website for latest version
‚Ä¢ Keep app updated for new features

faqs.question: ‚ùì Is Video Downloader Pro safe to use?
faqs.answer: ‚úÖ Yes! Our software is 100% safe, virus-free, and respects your privacy. We never track your downloads or collect personal data. All downloads are processed locally on your computer.

faqs.question: ‚ùì How do browser extensions work?
faqs.answer: ‚úÖ Our extensions integrate with Video Downloader Pro. When you click the extension icon on any video page, it automatically sends the video to the desktop app for download. The extension connects via local port 8799.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why is my download slow?
faqs.answer: üîß Check your internet connection. Enable aria2c in Settings for faster downloads. Make sure you're not downloading multiple videos simultaneously.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Audio and video are not merging?
faqs.answer: üîß Make sure ffmpeg is installed via 'Install Tools' button. The app needs ffmpeg to merge audio and video streams.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Extension is not working?
faqs.answer: üîß Make sure app is running. Check port 8799 is not blocked by firewall. Restart both app and browser.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Can I download from all video sites?
faqs.answer: ‚úÖ Yes! Video Downloader Pro supports 1000+ sites including YouTube, TikTok, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, Vimeo, Dailymotion, and many more.

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to upgrade to Premium?
faqs.answer: ‚≠ê Click the 'Upgrade to Pro' button in Download tab or go to Settings ‚Üí License Activation. Purchase a license from our website.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Why is video downloading without audio?
faqs.answer: üîß Make sure ffmpeg is installed. Go to Settings ‚Üí Dependency Management and install missing dependencies.

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to resume failed downloads?
faqs.answer: ‚úÖ Failed downloads can be resumed by clicking the download button again. The app uses yt-dlp's continue feature to resume from where it left off.

faqs.question: ‚ùì What are iTags?
faqs.answer: üè∑Ô∏è iTags are YouTube's internal format codes. Higher numbers generally mean better quality. The browser extension automatically selects the best iTag for your chosen quality.

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to change download folder?
faqs.answer: üìÅ Click 'Browse' button, select folder - it will be saved automatically for future downloads.

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to batch download?
faqs.answer: üì¶ Add multiple URLs one by one - they will queue automatically. For playlists, paste the playlist URL.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Audio extraction not working?
faqs.answer: üîß Make sure FFmpeg is installed via 'Install Tools' button. Also try converting to a different audio format like MP3 instead of M4A.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Where are my downloaded files?
faqs.answer: üìÅ Check 'Recent Downloads' section or open folder from completion dialog. Files are saved to your selected download folder.

faqs.question: ‚ùì How many free downloads do I get?
faqs.answer: üéØ Free users get 5 trial downloads. After that, upgrade to Pro for unlimited access.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Can I download from Netflix/Prime Video?
faqs.answer: üö´ No, these platforms have DRM protection. We support 1000+ other sites but cannot bypass DRM due to legal restrictions.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Is my data safe?
faqs.answer: üîí Yes, we don't collect or store any personal data. All downloads are local. We don't have servers storing your download history.

faqs.question: ‚ùì How to contact support?
faqs.answer: üìß Email: support@videodownloader.fwh.is or visit our website contact page.

faqs.question: ‚ùì Can I use on multiple computers?
faqs.answer: üíª Pro license allows use on up to 3 devices simultaneously.

faqs.question: ‚ùì App crashes on startup?
faqs.answer: üîß Try reinstalling the app, check system requirements, or run as administrator.

troubleshooting.title: üõ†Ô∏è Troubleshooting Guide
content: 4. Clear recent downloads if list is full
Include error details for faster support
